message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this incredible product. Given its immense value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,400,000. I believe this is a fair starting point for negotiations.
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer. While I recognize the product's value, your starting price is a bit high for me. I'd be willing to pay $1,100,000 for it.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  While I understand your perspective on the price, the value of this product is truly significant. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,300,000. I believe this reflects a fair compromise.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet me partway. To be completely transparent, my budget limit is closer to $1,200,000. If you're able to meet that price, I'm ready to close the deal.
